foundryvtt-chat-portrait.form-hint: Open configuration window. Refreshes current page on save
foundryvtt-chat-portrait.use-token-image: Use the actor's Token image instead of the actor's standard image.
foundryvtt-chat-portrait.portrait-size-l: Configure portrait image size on the chat messages. Default is 36 px
foundryvtt-chat-portrait.border-shape-l: Configure border shape of the portraits displayed on the chat messages. Setting this as None disables other border options
foundryvtt-chat-portrait.user-color-as-b: Use Player Color for Portrait Border
foundryvtt-chat-portrait.border-width-l: Configure portrait border width. Default is 2 px
foundryvtt-chat-portrait.user-color-as-c: Use the actor's player's color for the border of the entire chat message
Use the actor's player's color for the background of the entire chat message
foundryvtt-chat-portrait.flavor-next-to-: Display Chat Flavor Text next to Portrait
foundryvtt-chat-portrait.force-name-sear: If there is no Actor matching with chat message data, search for an actor of which name corresponds to the message speaker's alias. This option is needed for the compatibility with Theatre Insert module.
